name: Personalised E-learning Recommendation System
description: This project is an AI-powered learning platform designed to revolutionize the online education experience. It provides personalized course recommendations by analyzing student performance, interests, and learning styles. By leveraging advanced algorithms and machine learning models, the system continuously adapts to the evolving needs of each learner, ensuring that every recommendation is both relevant and timely.

name: E-commerce
description: This project is a full-stack e-commerce application built to provide a modern, secure, and engaging shopping experience. Users can browse products with rich descriptions and images, manage their shopping cart and wishlist, and apply coupon codes at checkout for instant discounts. The app integrates Stripe for safe and reliable payments, while customers can track their purchases through a detailed order history with real-time status updates. An AI-powered chatbot is available for instant support, making the shopping journey more interactive. The platform features a clean, responsive interface that ensures a smooth experience across all devices.

name: E-commerce admin
description: This project is a comprehensive full-stack e-commerce application designed to deliver a secure and seamless shopping experience. It features robust authentication mechanisms that ensure user data is safely managed, while its efficient product management system allows for easy catalog updates and inventory tracking.  a seamless checkout process, integrated with payment gateways for secure transactions.

name: Persona Based AI Bot
description: A modern React application that leverages Google's Generative AI to create personalized AI experiences.

name: Real Time Chat Application
description: This real-time chat application delivers a seamless messaging experience, similar to popular platforms like Messenger. Users can engage in one-on-one or group conversations with instant delivery, typing indicators, and read receipts. The app supports secure authentication, smooth media sharing, and a responsive interface for all devices.

name: STEM explores Club web app
description: STEM Explores Club Web App – A college project built during a PHP group assignment. Kids aged 8–14 can ask questions, explore STEM, and get help via a built-in chatbot for support.

name: Storify App
description: Storify is a cloud storage application inspired by Dropbox, allowing users to securely store, organize, and share files online. It supports folder management, media uploads, and seamless file access across devices. With an intuitive interface, users can collaborate easily, share links, and manage their files efficiently in real-time.

name: Stack Overflow Clone
description: This application replicates the core functionality of Stack Overflow, allowing users to ask questions, provide answers, and engage in community-driven discussions. It features user authentication, upvoting and downvoting of posts, real-time updates, and an organized interface for browsing questions by tags and categories.

name: Library Management System
description: A robust and user-friendly Library Management System designed to streamline book tracking, user management, and lending processes. Built with a modern tech stack, it offers a clean and responsive interface, efficient search and filter capabilities, and secure authentication to ensure smooth and secure library operations.

name: Real Estate Frontend
description: This project is a modern and responsive real estate website built with React. It offers a sleek and intuitive user interface that makes property browsing effortless. The website incorporates smooth animations using Framer Motion to enhance the visual experience, and it includes a seamless contact form integrated via W3Form for easy communication with real estate agents.

name: Finance Tracker App
description: The Finance Tracker App is a simple yet powerful tool designed to help users take control of their personal finances. It allows users to easily add, delete, and manage income and expense entries, providing a comprehensive overview of their financial status. With an intuitive and user-friendly interface, users can quickly log transactions, categorize their spending, and monitor their cash flow over time.

name: Phone Directory
description: A simple contact list application that allows users to save, manage, and delete contacts efficiently. It features a clean and user-friendly interface that makes navigating and organizing contacts effortless.

name: Contact List
description: A frontend application that fetches data from a Contact API and displays a list of contacts in an intuitive and user-friendly interface. It also offers dynamic search and filtering capabilities to help users quickly find the contacts they need.

name: not-to-do-list
description: The Not-To-Do-List is a unique productivity-focused app built with Javascript, designed to help users track and avoid tasks they should not be doing. The app provides an engaging way to highlight counterproductive habits and encourages users to stay focused on their priorities.
